bug.author: gwanseum
bug.description:
I am trying out this tutorial: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepchem/deepchem/blob/master/examples/encoders/encoder_example.py>https://github.com/deepchem/deepchem/blob/master/examples/encoders/encoder_example.py</denchmark-link>
When I run that code I get: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'deepchem.models.autoencoder_models' Any help would be very appreciated! I installed deepchem==2.3.0. And installing it with conda. <denchmark-code>Your code sample here </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Good find. This example is outdated and should be removed. I'll leave this issue open to track
deepchem.models.autoencoder_models move to contrib director and the current deepchem doesn't support this model. Maybe, we could close this issue.
